newsitem.title: UKRAINE: Ukraine T-bill yields: 6-,12-mo down, 9-mo same.
newsitem.headline: Ukraine T-bill yields: 6-,12-mo down, 9-mo same.

text.p: Average yields at auctions of six-month treasury bills edged down, nine-month yields were unchanged, and 12-month T-bills yields slipped from the most recent sales, a central bank statement said on Tuesday.
Six-month bills slipped to 30.29 from 30.34 percent, nine-month bills remained at 32.99 percent, and 12-month bills edged down to 37.62 from 38.02 percent.
Auctions of three-month T-bills were cancelled, but a central bank official said they would be sold on April 1.
The results of Monday's six-month discount T-bill auction, compared to the last issue, were as follows:
Issue volume no limit stated no limit stated
Amount sold 1.41 million UAH 1.39 million UAH
Actual amount raised 1.23 million UAH 1.20 million UAH
The central bank sold 14,141 T-bills, the bank's statement said. Of those 2,515 were competitive and 11,626 were non-competitive.
The date of the next auction of six-month discount T-bills is scheduled for April 1.
The results of nine-month discount T-bills auction, compared to last issue, were as follows:
Issue volume no limit stated no limit stated
Amount sold 2.18 million UAH 1.76 million UAH
Actual amount raised 1.75 million UAH 1.41 million UAH
The central bank sold 21,800 T-bills, the bank's statement said. Of those 21,010 were competitive and 790 were non-competitive.
The date of the next auction of nine-month discount T-bills is scheduled for April 1.
The results of the 12-month discount T-bill auction, compared to the last issue, were as follows:
Issue volume no limit stated no limit stated
Amount sold 18.14 million UAH 7.22 million UAH
Actual amount raised 13.19 million UAH 5.23 million UAH
The central bank sold 181,420 T-bills, the bank's statement said.
The date of the next auction of 12-month discount T-bills is scheduled for April 1.
